num compulsory corrective work .
with the exception of areas defined in item num all num metre segments with an iri num mmm shall be subject to compulsory corrective work or a mandatory penalty .
num mandatory penalty .
where compulsory corrective work is indicated the contractor shall be subject to performing the compulsory repairs or be subject to a num mandatory penalty for each occurrence .
the option to repair the compulsory corrective work segments or accept the mandatory penalty shall be at the contractors discretion .
the contractor shall notify the project engineer of their intention to perform repairs or accept the mandatory penalty within num calendar days of receipt of smoothness test results including any appeal test results .
based on the overall smoothness results the department reserves the right to waive the contractors right to perform any or all compulsory corrective work and enforce the mandatory penalty .
num optional corrective work .
the contractor shall be permitted to carry out corrective work on any num metre segment with average iri values as defined in table num .
table num category a category b category c iri mmm on num m segments where corrective work is permitted num num num num num num num corrective work procedures .
corrective work shall consist of removal and replacement of the surface course of asphalt concrete pavement .
the minimum length of any repair area shall be num metres .
num removal and replacement .
on each of the num metre segments affected the contractor shall remove by cold planing and replace the full width of the lane and the full depth of the surface course of asphalt concrete pavement affected including paved shoulders .
num asphalt concrete mix requirements .
the asphalt concrete mix used to construct the surface course shall conform to either division num section num or division num section num of the departments standard specification as stated in the contract .
february num hnum appendix h smoothness specification num incidental corrective work .
corrective work may result in additional incidental costs including but not limited to tack coat additional shoulder gravelling guardrail adjustments reapplication of pavement markings etc .
such work shall be carried out in accordance with the departments specifications and at the contractors expense .
num disposal of asphalt concrete .
asphalt concrete that has been removed as a result of corrective work undertaken by the contractor shall become the property of the contractor to haul stockpile or otherwise dispose of in an environmentally acceptable manner at the contractors expense .
num time limit for corrective work .
corrective work shall be completed within num calendar days of receipt of smoothness test results including any appeal test results .
corrective work not completed within the num calendar days will automatically be subject to a mandatory penalty as stated in item num .
under no circumstances will corrective work be permitted after december numst and will therefore automatically be subject to a mandatory penalty .
num retesting following corrective work .
after corrective work has been completed each of the num metre segments containing corrective work will be retested using the same profiler used in the original testing .
the new iri values will be used and the recalculated results will be binding .
should the new iri results indicate further compulsory corrective work segments as stated in item num the contractor shall be subject to the mandatory penalty as stated in item num .
num costs for corrective work .
all costs associated with corrective work including retesting shall be the responsibility of the contractor .
num appeals the contractor may appeal the original smoothness test results only once for either the entire section under contract if the overall price adjustment is a negative value penalty or for one or more of the num metre segments where compulsory corrective work apply or for one or more of the num metre segments where optional corrective work apply .
num timing of appeals .
appeals shall be received by the engineer within num hours of the contractors receipt of the original smoothness test results .
num appeal of compulsoryoptional corrective work segments .
the department will retest each of the num metre segments which contain appealed compulsory or optional corrective work segments .
retesting will be conducted in accordance with item num of this specification within num calendar days of receipt of written appeal notification .
efforts will be made to collect smoothness data within the num day period however in the event of inclement weather smoothness testing may have to be delayed until conditions are favorable .
such delays shall not constitute grounds for a claim from the contractor .
new iri summaries including the results of the appealed areas will be completed in accordance with item num and the results will be used to recalculate payment adjustments and identify areas requiring corrective work .
these results shall be binding and no further appeals will be granted .
if the new test results after the appeal testing verify that one or more of the segments no longer requires corrective work the department shall be responsible for all appeal testing costs .
otherwise the contractor shall be responsible for all appeal testing costs .
num appeal of entire section .
the department will retest the entire section under contract in accordance with item num of this specification within num calendar days of receipt of written appeal notification .
efforts will be made to collect smoothness data within the num day period however in the event of inclement weather smoothness testing may have to be delayed until conditions are favorable .
such delays shall not constitute grounds for a claim from the contractor .
new iri summaries using only the new test results will be completed for the entire section in accordance with item num and the results will be used to recalculate payment adjustments and identify areas requiring corrective work for the entire section .
the new results shall be binding and no further appeals will be granted .
if the new test results after the appeal testing verify that there is still a negative overall payment adjustment february num hnum appendix h smoothness specification penalty the contractor shall be responsible for all appeal testing costs .
